text: Kenneth Ronald Berry (November 3, 1933 â€“ December 1, 2018) was an American actor, dancer, writer and singer. He was born in Moline, Illinois. Berry starred on the television series F Troop, The Andy Griffith Show, Mayberry R.F.D. and Mama's Family. A Broadway actor, he starred in The Billy Barnes Revue and George M!. From 1960 to 1976, Berry was married to actress Jackie Joseph and the two adopted two children.
